description:
The intense second round of the regular meet at Asagaoka is over! Murmurs are still echoing in the venue over Akira`s provocative behavior as the contest enters round 3. The players are divided into two groups for a fastest finger board quiz. Sasajima and Mari are in the first group, but Mari is flustered when she learns that Sasajima was once a member of Kaijou`s quiz team. Does it have anything to do with why her brother quit quiz bowl? Her thoughts leave her unable to concentrate on the meet...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: とびきりの超エース様☆
